quotes.quote: No matter how sophisticated you may be, a large granite mountain cannot be denied â€” it speaks in silence to the very core of your being. Ansel Adams
In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.Aristotle
Nature is the art of God - LA NATURA E L'ARTE DI DIO. Dante Alighieri
The breath of flowers is far sweeter in the air than in the hand. Sir Francis Bacon
I think the environment should be put in the category of our national security. Defense of our resources is just as important as defense abroad. Otherwise what is there to defend?Robert Redford
Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.Pedro Calderon de la Barca
Earth laughs in flowers.Ralph Waldo Emerson
Don't knock the weather; nine-tenths of the people couldn't start a conversation if it didn't change once in a while.Kin Hubbard
I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.Frank Lloyd Wright
All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God.Thomas Browne
Nature is so powerful, so strong. Capturing its essence is not easy - your work becomes a dance with light and the weather. It takes you to a place within yourself. Annie Leibovitz
Nature, to be commanded, must be obeyed. Francis Bacon
Modern technology owes ecology an apology. Alan M. Eddison
